title: Nonreporting; penalty
context: ยง350-1.2 Nonreporting; penalty. Any person subject to section 350-1.1(a) who knowingly prevents another person from reporting, or who knowingly fails to provide information as required by section 350-1.1&copy; or (d), shall be guilty of a petty misdemeanor. [L 1985, c 17, ยง3; am L 1987, c 204, ยง5 and c 339, ยง4] Case Notes Cited: 711 F. Supp. 2d 1195 (2010).
